none:
Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on November 22, 2015 Description from Terminal Escape:
Murky and ominous deathpunk from Mexico. Forceful tracks from kids who know exactly what they are trying to achieve. "Christy" is the banger, a lurching and uncomfortable number with a tempo that surges, desperate vocals and guitar leads that put you on edge waiting for something to go wrong...nothing goes wrong. Everything goes right. This is their second demo from 2014, plus an EP released earlier this year and a third demo that just dropped a few weeks ago, so you've likely got some catching up to do, and i f you're feeling it, then ZOTZ are going to hit the spot.Â  ULTIMA NOCHE
//4.bp.blogspot.com/-02_oSm_Qx6g/VlIF_20wnqI/AAAAAAAANn4/9YpwBKQnIqA/s1600/zotz%2Bcover.jpg https://zotzpostpunk.bandcamp.com/ //3.bp.blogspot.com/-cBKReNqpuc8/VlIHglQ4n_I/AAAAAAAANoA/yPO1Z_KUsTw/s1600/zotz%2Bimg.jpg

seo.title: Zotz - Ultima Noche demo 2014 - Terminal Escape
